definition: two surfaces meeting at an angle different from 90 degrees, to heel over
details:
noun
- two surfaces meeting at an angle different from 90 degrees
= synonyms: bevel
- stock phrases that have become nonsense through endless repetition
= synonyms: buzzword
- insincere talk about religion or morals
= synonyms: pious platitude
- a characteristic language of a particular group, usually referring to thieves
= example: a characteristic language of a particular group, usually referring to thieves
= synonyms: vernacular
- a slope in the turn of a road or track
= synonyms: bank
verb
- to heel over
= synonyms: pitch
